description.p: Your patron is a powerful wielder of ice and cold. You have bound yourself to an ancient god of frost or cold.

sheet.description: Your patron is a powerful wielder of ice and cold. You have bound yourself to an ancient god of frost or cold.

description.p: The Ancient Frost lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

td.em: Cone of Cold, Steel Wind Strike

sheet.description: The Ancient Frost lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell.

description.p: At 1st level, you learn the ray of frost cantrip.

sheet.description: At 1st level, you learn the ray of frost cantrip.

description.p: At 6th level, you can use your charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls with your pact weapon(pact of the blade). You can have an ice mephit for your familiar(pact of the chain). When you deal cold damage with a cantrip you can add your charisma to damage(pact of the tome)

sheet.description: At 6th level, you can use your charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls with your pact weapon(pact of the blade). You can have an ice mephit for your familiar(pact of the chain). When you deal cold damage with a cantrip you can add your charisma to damage(pact of the tome)

description.p: At 10th level you gain the ability to conjure an ice elemental, as an action you can cast Conjure Elemental. An ice elemental is the same as an earth elemental with a few changes: It has resistance to cold damage, it deals magical cold damage.

sheet.description: At 10th level you gain the ability to conjure an ice elemental as an action. An ice elemental is the same as an earth elemental with a few changes: It has resistance to cold damage, it deals magical cold damage.

description.p: At 14th level whenever you cast a spell that deals cold damage it deals a further 2d8 cold damage, at 15th level it becomes 3d8, at 17th level it becomes 4d8
